title: The additional FSI shall be granted upon payment of premium which shall be paid in the manner as may be determined by the Government
clause_text: The additional FSI shall be granted upon payment of premium which shall be paid in the manner as may be determined by the Government. Such premium shall be recovered at the rate of 20% of the present day market value of the land under reference as indicated in the ASR.
section: Additional FSI to Biotechnology Units / Park

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
